title: Overall investment outlook for global aviation finance - White & Case LLP
content: Overall investment outlook for global aviation finance  White & Case LLP
description:
Subscribe

Stay current on your favorite topics



The year 2021 was another turbulent one for aviation, as governments raced to combat new COVID-19 variants with travel bans and border closures. From the rise of the Delta variant in the first half of the year to the first appearance of Omicron at the end, 2021 was a year in which disruption lurked around every corner.
